text: , known professionally as , is a Japanese actor. He was born in Tokyo. Igawa is known for his roles in British movies. His career began in 1979. Igawa is known for his roles in Revolver, Memoirs of a Geisha and The Last Samurai. He also voiced Hiro in many Thomas & Friends movies. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese movie actors Category:Japanese television actors Category:Japanese voice actors Category:Japanese stage actors Category:Actors from Tokyo
